definition: Alan Tam (1950-), Hong Kong Canto-pop singer and actor
Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)

sentences.english: No reason for disgust, she intones, no cause for condemnation.
sentences.chinese: 她詠吟道，沒必要去厭惡，沒理由去責難。

sentences.english: Jiao Yanshou and Wang Zhaojun lived in the same time. Jiao Yanshou wrote two poems of Zhaojun.

sentences.english: And He'll give you a new, sweet song.

sentences.english: Chapter Two tells of the music characteristics of Gregorian Chant.

sentences.english: Kids learn that accident, requirements of heart to take them to the hospital to visit.

sentences.english: Write down the poem of 'Yong Chong Yang' ?

sentences.english: The other, Yong Ching Ming poetry very much, Du Mu, "Qingming" the most famous poems.

sentences.english: Scores are provided. Teachers can play the piano and sing the songs with the children.

definition: Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
